name: Ivan Tetris
description:
Ivan Smart Tetris is a mobile-first, installable Tetris game built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Play anywhere with keyboard or touch controls. Features include:
- 10Ã—20 Tetris grid with all 7 Tetromino shapes
- Soft drop, rotation, and responsive controls
- Score, level, and offline high-score tracking
- Neon / dark theme toggle for a retro feel
- Sound effects and background music
- Fully installable Progressive Web App (PWA)
- Works offline and on mobile or desktop
Perfect for classic game lovers and PWA enthusiasts. Install and enjoy Tetris anytime!
